Node.definition: = state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= objects in one's possession that are considered of value
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans lack something that they are supposed to have

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= state in which humans and deities experience a desire to possess something, to live somewhere, or to associate with someone; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to eat > to enjoy|to eat > to use up
Node.definition: literally: to eat (goods); hence = pattern of actions by which someone makes a living off material goods until they are gone; ≈ often associated with joy
= state in which something or someone is identified as different or strange from one's own perspective

Node.gloss: to eat > to enjoy|to eat > to use up
Node.definition: literally: to eat (goods); hence = pattern of actions by which someone makes a living off material goods until they are gone; ≈ often associated with joy
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= an event that is considered morally and/or ethically wrong and that is not supposed to happen
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to be satisfied (with something)|to have one's fill (of something)
Node.definition: literally: to be satiated (with an event); hence: = process by which humans become more than fully engaged in a certain process or activity, which can be either good or bad

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= action by which the body of someone who died is laid down in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ not receiving a burial is considered a deep humiliation

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= process by which someone is going to die, described as a movement in one way only

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
literally: to cover (information); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities keep certain information hidden from others

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.gloss: to see the sun > to live
Node.definition: literally: to see the sub; hence: = state in which humans are alive
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
literally: to see good; hence: = state in which humans experience well being
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: to go; hence: = process by which living creatures live their life until the moment of death
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which someone's desire finds relief

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= something that is of benefit; often used in rhetorical questions suggesting that nothing is of benefit at all in a certain situation
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

= state of absence of wisdom, which manifests itself in excessive anger, talking too rashly and too much, sinful behavior, and laziness, ► and results in poverty, shame, punishment, and trouble and grief for other people; ≈ foolishness is thought to reside in a person's heart (לֵב) the behavior and treatment of fools is often compared to that of animals

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

Node.gloss: to know how|to be skilful at
Node.definition: literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
literally: striving after wind; hence: = action by which humans are actively looking to be engaged in activities that serve no purpose

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time, sometimes including an element of surprise
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= to engage in an argument with someone else regarding a perceived injustice
= state in which humans or deities are strong and powerful
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= something that is of benefit; often used in rhetorical questions suggesting that nothing is of benefit at all in a certain situation
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which objects are relatively low in quantity, or in which events are relatively low in frequency
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
